00032 class MyList : public QList<SongEntry>  {
00033 public:

00040     
00041     void            appendSong(Song* s);                    // appends <s> as simple SongEntry
00042     void            removeSong(Song* toDelete);     // removes all occurences of SongEntry with pointer to <toDelete>
00043     int             containsSong(Song* lookup);     // returns the number of occurences of the song
00044 
00045
